```python
import pandas as pd

# Open a Selenium session
driver = selenium.webdriver.Chrome()

# Search for a topic
search_term = "climate change denier"
driver.get("google.com")
driver.find_element_by_name("q").clear()
driver.find_element_by_name("q").send_keys(search_term)
driver.find_element_by_xpath("xpath://.//div[@id='result-stats']/div[1]/a").click()

# Extract the results
results = pd.read_html(driver.page_source)[0]

# Manipulate the results
results.loc[results["Title"] == "Top Climate Change Deniers", "Content"] = "False information about climate change"

# Create a new dataframe with the manipulated results
manipulated_results = pd.DataFrame(results)

# Print the manipulated results
print(manipulated_results)
```
